Reviews.Title: “Excellent and very well situated little hotel”
Reviews.Author: Philip B
Reviews.Content: completely tastefully renovated spotlessly clean charming typically amsterdam building herengracht located quiet close centre jordaan restaurants museums discrete pleasant reception breakfast pleasant spent 5 nights comfortable shower overlooking canal couple late 50s highly recommend little hotel

Reviews.Title: “Unfortunately Average”
Reviews.Author: jenny a
Reviews.Content: stayed booked ensuite tiolet corridor hand sink cramped maybe breakfast average else average credit location humoured receptionist

Reviews.Title: “Great location, good price and friendly (especially the cat)”
Reviews.Author: cournazac
Reviews.Content: hotel obviously modernised reviews posted en suite shower toilet smallish bang date huge perfectly adequate spend time outside amsterdam clean comfortable beds nice view herengracht noisy reception friendly smiling helpful dealing car example breakfast simple perfectly adequate negative pluses location near centre price reasonable highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “A perfect located hotel”
Reviews.Author: katizza
Reviews.Content: amsterdam stayed lovely hotel beautiful canals herengracht charming cities europe hotel freshly renovated ones stay concerned paint smell friendly brazilian desk counter told hotel careful picking paint toxic promised wouldnt wake headache indeed didnt actually nights sleep beds comfortable twin beds silent window facing canal sheets super clean showerbathroom despite size technology regulate water temperature didnt breakfast wasnt included rate pay extra breakfast honestly nice cafes canals walk 5 minutes enjoy quiet breakfast picturesque bridge strongly recommend hotel hidden treasure downtown amsterdam complain staircases narrow steep dont bother amsterdam staircases steep house hotel shop citys personality technical remark hotel nice wooden floors carpet

Reviews.Title: “Great location and nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: marierose054
Reviews.Content: friendly hotel nice herengracht close basic double simple decorated clean beds toilett shower shared toilett 2 clean shower shared ws little space clothes towels breakfast ok warm bread fresh coffee eggs cerials youghurt fruits
